_sText:
------------------------------------------------------
Summary - Surf Grave Final
------------------------------------------------------
Title : Grave
Level Name : Surf Grave Final
Filename : surf_grave_final
Version : 2.5
Release Date : 11/15/2006
Author : Xblah
Email Address : changremista@gmail.com
Web Site : http://xblahleveldesigns.tripod.com

------------------------------------------------------
Downloading - Surf Grave Final
------------------------------------------------------

If none of the mirrors of FPS Banana work, you can
download all the files by this mirror:
http://geocities.yahoo.com.br/changremista/surf_grave_final.zip

------------------------------------------------------
Installing - Surf Grave Final
------------------------------------------------------

To install the map, open the .zip file and extract all
the files to the directory: ...\cstrike\maps\

------------------------------------------------------
In Game Configuration - Surf Grave Final
------------------------------------------------------

Surf Maps need some diferent configurations. It's the
case of this map. To surf on it, you have to write the
following sentences in the console of your mod:

sv_airaccelerate 200
sv_gravity 750

------------------------------------------------------
Details - Surf Grave Final
------------------------------------------------------
Game : Counter-Strike: Source
Type : Surf - Bomb Defusing
Recommended Players : 2-16
Mods : CS:S
Description : ---
Known Bugs : None
Construction Time : 2 Weeks
Editor Used : Hammer WE 4.0
Base Textures : De Piranesi

-------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------
